name: UNiagaraValidationRule_UserDataInterfaces
doc: This validation rule checks to see if you have exposed user data interfaces.

bOnlyIncludeExposedUObjects: Only include data interfaces that contain exposed UObject properties in them.
BannedDataInterfaces: List data interfaces to validate against, if this list is empty all data interfaces will be included.
AllowDataInterfaces: List data interfaces that we always allow.
Severity: How do we want to repro the error in the stack
